module.text: Zarafa web interface is available at : http://@HOSTNAME@/webaccess/
Mail module with Zarafa support is activated in the MDS interface : http://@HOSTNAME@/mmc/
You can create mail domains in the MDS interface and specify mail adresses to users and groups
You have to set zarafa attributes to users and groups from the MDS interface if you want them in zarafa
- SSL is enabled on the smtp server
- IMAP and IMAPS protocols are enabled
- iCal and CalDAV protocols are enabled. You can access calendars on http://@HOSTNAME@:8080/caldav and http://@HOSTNAME@:8080/ical with your mail client, or on port 8443 over https
- Networks authorized to send mail without authentication :
Make sure you have enabled mail services (SMTP 25, SMTPS 465, IMAP 143, IMAPS 993, CalDAV/iCal 8080 and 8443 (SSL)) on your firewall
